  • Method Details

    • handleConnection

      protected final void handleConnection(Socket sock) throws IOException
      Description copied from class: SocketTestBase.ServerThread
      Callback used to handle a connection call. After returning from this call, the socket is closed. Use SocketTestBase.ServerThread.stopAcceptingConnections() to stop accepting new calls.
      Specified by:
      handleConnection in class SocketTestBase<A extends SocketAddress>.ServerThread
      Parameters:
      sock - The socket to handle.
      Throws:
      IOException - upon error.
